TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigExcC14NTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示數位簽章的獨佔 C14N XML 規範化轉換 (不包含註解)，如全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 所定義。

span.span: Represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), without comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表不含註解的獨佔 C14N XML 規範化轉換。The class represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform without comments. 這個類別是類似於類別，可讓以建立摘要，使用標準形式的 XML 文件的簽署人。This class is similar to the class, which allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 不過，類別會排除正式的子文件中的上階的內容。However, the class excludes ancestor context from a canonicalized subdocument. 使用類別，當您需要進行規範化 XML 子文件，使其獨立於其的 XML 內容。Use the class when you need to canonicalize an XML subdocument so that it is independent from its XML context. 例如，應用程式等使用的 Web 服務簽署的 XML 中複雜的通訊協定通常需要進行規範化 XML 以這種方式。For example, applications such as Web services that use signed XML within complex communication protocols often need to canonicalize XML in this manner. 這類應用程式通常會將 XML 信封內各種動態建構的項目可以大幅變更文件，且會造成 XML 簽章驗證失敗。Such applications often envelop XML within various dynamically constructed elements, which can substantially change the document and cause XML signature verification to fail. 類別從標準的子文件中排除這類上階內容以解決這個問題。The class solves this problem by excluding such ancestor context from the canonical subdocument. 一般而言，您不會建立規範化轉換類別的新執行個體。Typically, you do not create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定規範化轉換，將傳遞描述要轉換的統一資源識別元 (URI)屬性，因此可從屬性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes a transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要取得規範化轉換的參考，請使用屬性，因此可從屬性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 您已建立規範化轉換類別的新執行個體，只有在您想要以手動方式雜湊的 XML 文件，或使用您自己的標準化演算法時，才需要。You are required to create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class only when you want to manually hash an XML document or use your own canonicalization algorithm. 描述 URI類別由定義欄位。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 描述 URI類別由定義欄位。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 如需詳細的獨佔 C14N 轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 XMLDSIG 規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。For more information about the exclusive C14N transform, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. 規範化演算法被定義在 W3C 標準 XML 規格中，將會位於 www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 XML 文件類別使用包裹簽章。The following code example shows how to sign an XML document with the class using an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/VB/example.vb#1)]

span.span: The namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，此類別指定了命名空間前置詞清單，使用標準規範化演算法進行規範化。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying a list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`參數包含泛空白字元分隔的清單，以便使用標準規範化演算法，而不是獨佔標準化演算法進行規範化的命名空間前置詞。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定預設命名空間，其中不含前置詞，會傳遞指定之前置詞"#default 」。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`參數包含泛空白字元分隔的清單，以便使用標準規範化演算法，而不是獨佔標準化演算法進行規範化的命名空間前置詞。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定預設命名空間，其中不含前置詞，會傳遞指定之前置詞"#default 」。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".

returns.span: XML 節點的清單，代表 XMLDSIG 項目中描述目前 物件所需要的轉換特定內容。

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含泛空白字元分隔的清單，以便使用標準規範化演算法，而不是獨佔標準化演算法進行規範化的命名空間前置詞。The property contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定預設命名空間，其中不含前置詞，會傳遞指定之前置詞"#default 」。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 XML 文件類別使用包裹簽章。The following code example shows how to sign an XML document with the class using an envelope signature. summary.span: 取得型別陣列，其為目前 物件之 方法的有效輸入。

span.span: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the method of the current object.

value.span: 目前 物件的有效輸入型別陣列；您可以只將其中一種型別的物件傳遞到目前 物件的 方法。

span.span: An array of valid input types for the current object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the method of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的陣列屬性必須包含至少一個項目，因為每個物件必須接受做為有效的輸入至少一個類型。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every object must accept at least one type as valid input. A物件通常會接受一或多個下列類型做為輸入： ， ，或。A object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: , , or .

summary.span: 取得可以從目前 物件的 方法輸出的型別陣列。

span.span: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the methods of the current object.

value.span: 目前 物件的有效輸出型別陣列；目前 物件的 方法只會傳回其中一種型別的物件。

span.span: An array of valid output types for the current object; the methods of the current object return only objects of one of these types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的陣列屬性必須包含至少一個項目，因為每個轉換必須產生做為輸出的至少一個類型。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.
